manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description:
This is the Fantom Netbeans Plugin (Thibaut Colar) More infos: http://fantomide.colar.net/
Fantom language: http://www.fantom.org/
This is released under the Artistic License 2.0 (see also licenses of bundled libraries bellow)
---Bundled Java Libraries--- * parboiled.jar: Parboiled parser support: Apache License 2.0 http://wiki.github.com/sirthias/parboiled/ * fantom (sys.jar): Academic Free Licence http://www.fantom.org/ * javaOnTracks.jar: Artistic Licence 2.0 http://www.javaontracks.net/ * H2.jar: Database (Mozilla Licence & Eclipse Licence) http://www.h2database.com/ ----------------------------
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.jdesktop.layout/1 > 1.7.1.103, org.netbeans.api.debugger/1 > 1.17.1, org.netbeans.api.debugger.jpda/2 > 2.19.1, org.netbeans.api.java.classpath/1 > 1.19.1, org.netbeans.core.output2/1 > 1.11.1.1, org.netbeans.modules.csl.api/2 > 2.4.1.2.1.1.4, org.netbeans.modules.debugger.jpda/2 > 1.23.2, org.netbeans.modules.debugger.jpda.ant > 1.11.1, org.netbeans.modules.debugger.jpda.projects > 1.5.2, org.netbeans.modules.editor.indent/2 > 1.12.1.9, org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib/2 > 2.8.1.10.2, org.netbeans.modules.extexecution/2 > 1.14.1, org.netbeans.modules.java.debug > 1.5.2.1.8.7, org.netbeans.modules.java.platform/1 > 1.12.1, org.netbeans.modules.java.project/1 > 1.25.1, org.netbeans.modules.java.source > 0.52.1.8.8.2, org.netbeans.modules.javascript.kit/1 > 0.105.2, org.netbeans.modules.lexer/2 > 1.30.1.1, org.netbeans.modules.options.api/1 > 1.12.1, org.netbeans.modules.parsing.api/1 > 1.26.1.2, org.netbeans.modules.projectapi/1 > 1.24.1, org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi/1 > 1.35.1.6, org.netbeans.spi.debugger.ui/1 > 2.16.1, org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel/2 > 1.17.1, org.openide.actions > 6.9.1.1, org.openide.awt > 7.8.1.1, org.openide.dialogs > 7.10.1, org.openide.filesystems > 7.21.1.1.1, org.openide.loaders > 7.5.1, org.openide.modules > 7.10.1, org.openide.nodes > 7.9.1.1, org.openide.text > 6.22.1, org.openide.util > 7.22.1.1, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.2.1, org.openide.windows > 6.26.1
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Support for the Fantom programming language
